values: I am moving out into a house in Ocala next weekend. Leave the love.
To say I have it all would be an understatement. Life goes on, pains goes away. Never forget that.

Take the quiz: "What does your birth month reveal about you?"

January
Stubborn and hard-hearted. Ambitious and serious. Loves to teach and be taught. Always looking at people's flaws and weaknesses. Likes to criticize. Hardworking andproductive. Smart, neat and organized. Sensitive and has deep thoughts. Knows how to make others happy. Quiet unless excited or tensed. Rather reserved. Highly attentive. Resistant to illnesses but prone to colds. Romantic but has difficulties expressing love. Loves children. Loyal. Has great social abilities yet easily jealous. Very Stubborn and money cautious. That was creepy..

Working a lot and making a lot of money. Vacation til monday in Cape Coral. Thanksgiving in Ocala. 





For a person who "hates" the people around Spring Hill so much, you certainly do love checking up on them and bitching about it. Try not posting arguements in your livejournal for once, cunt.



EDIT: Funny part is... I just deleted it. Go to hell. Don't waste YOUR time. Silly faggot.

Today was good...then shitty..then good. 

I found playing with a single bass pedal can be really refreshing and alot of fun. It makes your feet work alot harder. My right foot has progressed a ton from when I first started playing. My obsession with all things drums just won't go away...and I love it.

I have to work 12 - 5 tomorrow so I can take off Friday afternoon for Halloween Horror Nights. It will be more than worth it though.  No worries. I like root beer.

I have to send some Dickies stuff back to get the right size. Must remember that tomorrow. 

Uhhh Have a nice night?

Well hmm..

Today's practice had more floor toms and lower frequences than should be EVER used but it was awesome as hell. Jimmy's fuse in his amp went to fuse heaven. It got all blackened and destroyed. Brennen is better than you at Mortal Kombat. I had a lot of fun.

In other news, Told my parents I don't think of my mom as an actual "parent". She's more like an obstacle. 

I probably have the biggest and well organized drum set in all of Spring hill yet Sherie said it looked kind of small today. I MUST ADD MORE! >:O

Work is...well work. Making money, can't complain. I don't have to mooch off my parents. Taking Friday off to go to Halloween Horror Nights with Sherie. That should be an insane amount of fun. 

I never talk to Brian anymore. No big fight..he just stopped talking to me. Weird. No biggie.

As I'm sitting here in my boxers my ball sack keeps falling out and hitting the cold chair making me wish I was dead. Sorry about telling you that...had to vent somewhere. To be honest, I have no idea why I'm posting anyways.



"All his friend's are sad little impressionable girls that he can manipulate to his liking" <<< Sooo true

im happy for everyone really



i hate you

"On this day in 2001, over 3,000 people died due to the Bush administration's tireless efforts to neglect terrorist threats and treat human lives like dollar store toys.  God bless America!"

The absolute ignorance of this statement makes me sick. Not only has the 9/11 commission placed very little blame on the Bush white house, They have let it be known that CLINTON let these activities grow and grow under serious threats. 80 something days into office, we are attacked and it's Bush's fault? I think not. Clinton, the almighty dumb ass, allowed the Taliban multiple times to get away with horrible crimes. I mark today let's spit on Democrat's who blame Bush for 9/11 day.

Ask yourself the question? Who would Osama bin Laden want for president? A hypocritical moron who can't makeup his mind on the simplest issues or a strong leader who is ready to sacrifice for a greater good? Bush has been up Bin Laden's ass since 9-12-02. Kerry would sit with his thumb up his ass. John Kerry proposed to have a large faction of american troops under U.N. control...that alone makes me wish he fell dead on the spot. He says we have no backing in Iraq.... I'mm sorry we left out France and Germany, dildo. This isn't meant to start arguments or fights. I have very strong feelings toward this years election and I'm tired of this countries youth going to watch Fahrenheit 911 and taking it as fact. Grow up America.
The places that you've come to fear the most.

Update on Life:

 Pro's
I have a girlfriend that means everything to me. 
I have friends that are the best in the world. 
I have a band that does nothing but make me laugh and have fun.
I am about to have a job starting monday.
My schooling is done until August. Then 1 test and it's over.
I have nothing to hide or worry about.
I have gotten my shit straight for once in my life. 
I'm drinking sprite remix berry clear..and it's soo good.
I'm getting a new computer for my room and the hunk of junk in my room is going to my sister's.
My drumming = better.

Cons 
My family
I need a shower
I owe ryan 5 bucks

Just want to leave on a good note. No more drama...Livejournal breeds and festers it. My life as it stands has many more pros than cons...and it's been so long, I can't remember since I have been this happy.

I kinda sound emo...It's ok I'm listening to Shadows Fall.


BUKAKI

Friday was awesome.... Out to eat with sherie and her rents...awesome food. rented movies and i went home. Marc picked me up after that and we went to wallly world and left after a whole 45 min. Came home and slept. Sherie got mad at me.

Saturday - Woke up.. marc left for CoF practice...we picked up brian and headed for Guitar Center. Got there after sitting all squished in my car. Bought an Evans Hd Dry snare head. Me and Brian haggled like a son of a bitch and got him a jesus Crate amp for only $250 with a year warrenty...JESUS AMP...Sherie is off at the movies with her friends. My house is clean which makes me happy.

My dad is coming home and going on short term disability cuz work is killing his back..these next couple of monthes will be hell..

Sherie's mom might have found me a job working school hours so i can make money and get away from my house. 

Monday = Band practice and FUCKING G.E.D shit...argh on that..

I wish we could practice more but nooooooooo damn Naturecoast is a dildo.


Ohh yeah btw.... my snare head is also jesus. fuck remo.



Brian is a bukaki star...

Well all goes well....

worked my ass off the last two days..

UHHHHHH!!! got the AoE 2 expansion and its JESUSUSUSUS. Got enough to get Sherie stuff. 

Friday (sherie's b-day) - Arigato's with Sherie and her family, good eats.
Saturday - Guitar Center with Brian...He's buying a new guitar amp and I'm getting a new snare head thanks to him..
Sunday (1 year 6 month's) - Hanging with Sherie and giving her more presents
Monday - PRACTICE with chris and Brian!!!

I'm hungry and thristy...


Kamikazi CAT....

Money I need....

$45 for Meinl Medium Bell for drums
$79 for fixing my computer
$15 for new snare head
$ Unknown for Sherie's B-day/Anniversery
$10 I owe Sherie'

Money I have..

$0        ARGHHHH!!!!!!!

In other news, Me, Brian and Chris might be starting up a band. Brians buying a new amp so that's cool. Who knows what might happen. Bands are good.

I miss Ree Bee times 57.


I got my hair cut. It's pretty.

Braces = off and I'm the happiest person on earth right now.




Age of Empires 2 is more addicting then Heroin.

Another long weekend with Sherie, Marc, Brian, Brennen, Cj. I love weekends so much.

Sherie's B-day is this Friday so I must do something good for her...and to make it even better our 1 and 1/2 year is 2 days after that. Argh I need money.

CoF is back in action. Go them. The Bolton Cult and Chewin On Foil rock the cock times 22446688

I went to sleep at like 8 so now im awake at 4.... Damn causality straight to hell. 

Nights at my house are the only peaceful time that you can sit out herer and just relax. When I'm president I'm requiring ATLEAST one hour of the day to relaxing. 

I really made myself happy with my drumming yesterday :). 

Brad for President..... OF THE WORLD YOU BITCHES!!


btw Brian hates us...lol

I want a band...


right.......now.....or now.........and ohh yeah....now


really tired of waiting

i also need to go to the doctors for my ankle.. in four weeks ive sprained it really bad twice and keep walking on it like a jackass. argh on me for that. i blame my for being so hardheaded and making me inherit it. im starting to get sharp pains when walking.

i kinda gave up on this thing but hey why not add a little entry

ever have something to say but you cant say it? you just talk to yourself about it? well im tired of that

coming from me..this might not mean much to some people. but listen, the majority of local bands have been resorted to nothing but a bunch of guys hating other people and using thier band as a reason to annihilate other people. im done with it all. we all love music and need to realize being in bands is about that.... music. feeling something and letting it out with instruments. i dont know why it has resorted to all this. 

i want it back to when i could sit down play with people and not worry about screwing up anything because you know no one cares. its all about fun. ive talked to louis about this and me and him both agree that the best times in the world are when we sit there and dont try to be jesus, we play what we feel. i want it back to where after a song is over you say "wow that was awesome". 

at one time most of us were good friends.... me marc louis kyle john chris cj brian even barlow...now its all hell. im putting down my stupid reasons for not liking people. im tired of not having as much fun as we could. starting tonight im going to try to make our band actually work out...making good music we ALL like and would feel confident enough to play to other people. no more taking sides... we are all friends. if it continues this way no one will like anyone. cmon guys. lets all fuck around and have fun. most of us are only 17,,,im hoping to live a whole lot longer than that... so lets get over the egos...


now i dont want any one to take this as a smack to the face... i love my band with marc brian and louis. i LOVE IT but some things needs to be fixed. maybe this entry was a mistake? maybe its not. i miss it all so much


i just want to have fun again

tell me what ya think...

ummmmm lets seee.......update on life as it stands. good weekend hanging out with john, marc and brennen. john left but the rest of us had a good night, we nearly killed each other. ummmm right now im watching the mike portnoy video. awesome new song i wrote. me and sherie are better than ever. my house is as it always is....left for me to do it all while everyone is gone. doesnt surprise me though. hopefully i can get the band going. anything else??? hi hats will be here on friday hopefully. my bday is in 10 days.. wahoo for that i guess. i really dont like complaining and that seems to be most of what i do in here. (0_o) off to clean and drum.....
'

 

tee heeee
wahoooooooooooooooooo......got the new hi-hats.....nothing better than new drum stuff!!!!!! sabian aa metal-x!!!!!! yesssssssssss
well chewin on foil is back......and so is the original dryfus.... that me and john are in...everything seems weird but better...ummmm didnt get hi-hats who cares? not i really. practice on friday...

hmmmm still bored.. sitting around the house straightening things up seems to be my life. who cares its better than nothing. 8 hours left on my hi-hats..lol no one cares. talked to louis for about an hour. the reailty of chewin on foil is getting clearer and clearer. go them. ummm what else? i want to play....in a band...with people who like the music...anyone interested? cant complain though. no real huge problems...just small annoying things but they go away. no idea what im doing today??? prolly not a thing

diet pepsi is god's gift to humanity

hey, first entry (kinda).....well my last entry was written when i was pissed so no need for that to be here. ummm nothing but the usual to do today. bidding on ebay for new Sabian AA metal -x hi-hats for my set..hope to get those =) things with sherie are getting alot better which is always good. she doesnt know what shes done to help me out at times. i love her for that. hmmm what else? ohh yea last night was interesting..i guess Cj and marc talked about COF again...which is awesome but comes at loss for me and my band because no one but louis should fill that position playing bass for them. but its alright.. i thought about it a lot and its better this way...our band was awesome but it hadn't really had it wings yet so no worries. maybe back to chris and kyle?? who knows.. in a way i miss playing with them and all the fun times..but at times i hated them more than anything. they are good friends so we'll figure something out. well i'm off to practice for an hour or so...
